title: Project Setup and CLI Skeleton
description: Create the Python project scaffold, config loading, and logging utilities. Add a minimal CLI entry point to run the agent.

title: Pedagogical Planner
description: Implement the lesson planning module and prompt templates that convert a user question into a short, structured teaching plan.

title: LLM Reasoning Core
description: Implement the LLM interface to generate explanations, code examples, and follow-up questions based on the lesson plan.

title: CLI Teaching Flow Output
description: Wire the planner and LLM core into a CLI command that outputs lesson plan, explanation, code, and diagram in a single run.

title: Tool Router and File Operations
description: Implement tool routing for create file, write code, and open file actions with explicit safety confirmations.

title: VS Code Automation
description: Add OS-level automation to open VS Code, focus the editor, and type code step-by-step with a manual fallback path.

title: Mermaid Diagram Output
description: Generate a Mermaid diagram block from the lesson content and include it in CLI output and saved artifacts.

title: Structured Logging and Traces
description: Add structured logging and a JSON trace output that records inputs, decisions, and actions for replay and debugging.

title: Demo Script and Sample Questions
description: Create a scripted demo flow and sample C++ questions to showcase the end-to-end teaching experience.
